dialogue.text: I decide to check out the cafe at night for once.
I’ve known that they’re open later than just mornings for quite a while, but I guess I really haven’t had any reason to go knowing that Rin wouldn't be working.
But hey, this is a cafe.
I’m sure there’s bound to be another overly-perky, slightly-weird girl behind the counter no matter what.
Greeting and salutations, Supreme Overlord!
Oh, right. You work here.
I do! Though, some of my co-workers may disagree with that statement!
What can I get for you today, Sir? A cappuccino? Double espresso? Or perhaps...
DESTRUCTION?!
Yes, Molly. One order of destruction.
Small, medium, or THE GATES OF HELL?
How much coffee have you had to drink tonight?
I CAN’T EVEN FEEL MY HANDS ANYMORE!
I guess it’s not surprising that Molly works here...
Her and Rin seem like pretty good friends, so I’m sure that them being together all the time has something to do with that.
Still, though...why did Haruka hire {i}Molly{/i} of all people? Isn’t she a little too...{i}everything{/i} for this place?
Molly, just out of curiosity, how do you still have a job?
That question would be better answered by the Magistrate of Mammaries, Sir. Though, I'm sure Rin has something to do with it.
I'm sure it helps that I only work nights now and no one has to deal with me directly anymore.
I'm surprised to see you here so late, though. I was under the impression you only showed up in the mornings- and quite often at that!
How exactly do you know about how often I come here if you don't directly work with Haruka or Rin anymore?
I may have mentioned something along the lines of a...contract with a new master in our group chat. Which then evolved into a conversation about you.
Oh, good. A private group chat where three girls I see on a near daily basis are free to gossip about me. That is exactly what I needed.
I'm guessing that means Haruka knows you're in my class now?
Well, I didn’t exactly word it like that, but yes. I believe that is the impression she got.
Can I take this visit as an omen that you will be visiting me at night more often, Sir?
Not that...you can visit me in the mornings on account of the whole {i}how hard I am to handle{/i} thing.
To be completely honest, you don’t seem any easier to handle at night.
You’re just not a high enough level yet, Sir.
I can't be equipped until much later into the game.
Stop hinting at a future for us. I am your teacher and that is disgusting.
I will make you mine through methods unknown to mere mortals.
And how do you plan on doing that, exactly?
Mind control, perhaps?
Or maybe I’ll just win you over with my feminine wiles?
What wiles? You haven’t done a single {i}feminine{/i} thing since I’ve met you.
I don’t know! Foreigners are appealing to men, aren’t they?
And now that we’re alone, I bet you’re thinking something like, “WOW, WHAT A CUTE GIRL” or whatever it is h-game protagonists think.
Not really. I'm still stuck on trying to figure out why you haven't been fired yet.
I’m plenty good at my job!
We've been talking for five minutes and you haven't even finished taking my order yet.
I just like talking and I’m excited to see my teacher after school!
Ms. Watabe never came to the cafe! She always talked about how tea was better and that coffee was just hot bean water!
And any time I tried to tell her we had tea as well, she told me to leave her alone and that she just wanted to die!
Huh. Coffee really is just hot bean water, isn't it?
Well...yes. I believe it is. But it’s good for other stuff too. Like when you need to stay up late....{i}studying{/i} and stuff.
Molly, please don’t feel the need to pretend you study around me. I might be your teacher, but it’s not like I have any intention of-
Well, teaching.
Fuck yeah!
Ami was right when she said you were the best [uncle] in the world!
Will you be my [uncle] too, Sir?
I don’t think that’s possible.
Then will you adopt me and become my new father?!
I’m not good at cooking or cleaning, but I’m certain I would make decent company on a rainy day!
I'm not really looking to adopt right now. Nor do I think Ami would be okay with it.
I know you guys are in the manga club together, but she hasn’t ever really talked about you before and I doubt she views you as a sister.
Ami hasn't talked about me before?!
Is that really something to yell about?
Of course! Ami is a loyal member of the Cult of Molly!
We have plans to conquer the demon king and restore order to the forest one day!
You’re really going to need to learn to talk about things I actually understand if this relationship is ever going to work out.
Oh ho ho ho~ So you accept my contract after all?
Contract? What contract?
You just said we’re in a relationship.
And even if it were a slip of the tongue, these are words that will greatly shape the rest of our time together, Supreme Overlord.
If Molly MacCormack is to become the lead heroine of this visual novel, hearing things like “relationship” only allude to its truth!
Just out of curiosity, you haven't heard anything about how much time I’ve spent with the other students, right?
Because you seem pretty dead-set on this whole heroine thing and I’m not quite sure if you fully understand what you're getting yourself into.
Oh ho ho~ You underestimate me, Sir.
I just so happen to be an expert in the world of dating sims.
But not...actual dating? Why choose to live a life like that when real humans exist?
You don’t choose 2D, Sir. 2D chooses you.
But even if it didn’t, I would have wound up here eventually!
There’s nothing quite like watching romance flourish from textbox to textbox. H-Scene to H-Scene!
Would you mind explaining to me what some of those things mean? Because I feel like I need to understand what an “H-Scene” is if I'm ever going to catch up with this conversation.
The “H-Scene” is the holy grail of dating sims, Sir!
The moment where two characters consummate their love for another in the form of...{i}you know what{/i}.
You mean by throwing peanuts at each other and pretending it was an accident?
Yup!
So, let me get this straight-
You would willingly choose a life where the only physical contact you have with anyone is done through a computer screen with a fictional character?
You don’t get it at all.
It’s not just about the physical part, Sir.
It’s about the emotions leading up to it! The build-up! The will-they, won’t-they!
That exists in real life too, though.
REAL LIFE IS STUPID! THERE’S NO BACKGROUND MUSIC OR TSUNDERE CHARACTERS! JUST NTR AND PREGNANCY!
And what is NTR exactly?...
HORRIBLE! THAT’S WHAT!
I can feel passion and anger beginning to exude from Molly’s being, turning the cafe roughly three degrees hotter.
And in other news, we are now roughly ten minutes into this and I still do not have a drink in my hands.
Uhh, Molly.
What do you want?! I’m having a crisis and remembering a thing that happened in a game I played!
NTR warnings should be mandatory! Not everyone is into that! It genuinely hurts some people!
Molly, I would like to order a drink now.
Oh, right. I’m at work.
What would you like? It’s on me today.
Woah, really? Rin never offers to give me anything for free and I’ve been ordering from her for months.
Rin is much better at her job than I am.
It is not often I form connections with live males, so I must do everything in my power to keep this one going strong.
The best course of action would be for me to meet your father and inform him that my intentions are nothing but pure.
That is fine with me, Sir!
I believe it is customary for me to meet {i}your{/i} parents, though.
It would make for a heartwarming scene where I bond with your mother and cook dinner with her.
That sounds...great. But I honestly don’t even know if my parents are still alive.
Oh! Shoot. I’m sorry, Sir. I didn’t mean anything by it. I just got swept up in my-
It’s fine, Molly. Don’t beat yourself up over it. I really couldn’t care less, to be honest.
But that’s so sad...
Yeah, that's life for you.
We’re all going to die someday, so we might as well live it up while we can, right?
Master!
...What?
Thank you!
What’s going on? Why are you thanking me?
That was just the inspiration I needed to convince myself to level-cap my druid tonight!
Your...what?
That doesn’t matter!
Just know that I greatly appreciate it!
Okay, but can I-
Coffee! Yes! I will infuse it with a special buff just for you as well!
I’m not really a fan of sugar-
ONE MOLLY-SPECIAL, COMING RIGHT UP!
As it turns out, it isn’t just Rin who vehemently refuses to make anything that is actually on the menu here.
The only difference is that Rin’s custom drinks are actually fit for human consumption.
And I’m pretty sure that whatever Molly winds up making for me contains cocaine, because I wind up walking home with my hands shaking uncontrollably after just one sip...
{i}Molly’s affection has increased to [molly_love]!{/i}
